attributes.action: Increase NI contributions for higher paid & pensioners with above average income
attributes.additional_details: It will significantly increase the money available to fund the NHS and ensure staff are adequately paid for their work
attributes.background: Abolish the lower rate of National Insurance contributions so everyone pays the same rate (currently 12%). In addition make those above retirement age with income greater than the national average for those in work pay National Insurance on that part of their income.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. The title of your petition, which calls for higher paid people to have higher National Insurance contradicts your request that "everyone pays the same rate".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
